Question
========

When testing the null hypothesis Î¼ = 6 with a two-sided risk of 5% the value of the test quantity (tgh) and the conclusion will be apply:

Answerlist
----------

* Value of tgh falls in critical area, reject H0.
* TRUE value of tgh falls into critical area, do not reject H0.
* TRUE of tgh does not fall into critical area, reject H0.
* TRUE of tgh does not fall into critical area, do not reject H0.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* TRUE value of tgh falls into critical area, reject H0...: Correct
* TRUE Value of tgh falls into critical area, reject H0 not...: Incorrect
* TRUE Value of tgh does not fall into critical area, reject H0...: Incorrect
* TRUE of tgh does not fall into critical area, do not reject H0...: Incorrect
